translation: And Shiva, the rider of the Bull, playing his tabor, is looking elegant.

gurmukhi: igry bwj gwjI gjI bIr KyqM ]
transliteration: Gire Baaj Gadoo Gadoo Boor Khetan||
translation: In the battlefield, the thundering heroes have fallen alongwith the elephants and horses;

gurmukhi: ruly q`C mu`CM ncy BUq pRyqM ]2]258]
transliteration: Rule Tachchh Mouchchhan Nache Bhoot Pretan||2||258||
translation: And seeing the chopped heroes rolling in dust, the ghosts and goblins are dancing.2.258.
The blind trunks and brave Batital are dancing and the fighting warriors alongwith the dancers,
With the small bells tied around waists have also been killed.
All the resolute assemblies of saints have become fearless.

gurmukhi: nmo lok mwqw Bvy sqRu jIqy ]3]259]
transliteration: Namo Lok Maataa Bhave Satr(u) Jite||3||259||
translation: O the mother of the people ! Thou hast performed a nice task by conquering the enemies, I salute Thee.3.259.

gurmukhi: pVHy mUVH Xw ko DnM Dwm bwFy ]
transliteration: Padhe Moondh Yaa Ko Dhanan Dhaam Baadhe||
translation: If any foolish person recites this (poem), his wealth and property will increase here.

gurmukhi: sunY sUm soPI lrY ju`D gwFy ]
transliteration: Sounai Soom Sophoo Darai Juddh Gaddhe||
translation: If anyone, not participating in the war, listens to it, he will be bestowed with the power of fighting. (in battle).

gurmukhi: jgY rYix jogI jpY jwp XwN ko ]
transliteration: Jagad Rain(i) Jogoo Japai Jaap Yaan Ko||
translation: And that Yogi, who repeats it, keeping awake throughout the night,

gurmukhi: DrY prm jogM lhY is`Dqw ko ]4]260]
transliteration: Ddarai Param Jouang Lahai Siddhataa Ko||4||260||
translation: He will attain supreme Yoga and miraculous powers.4.260.
Any student, who reads it for the attainment of knowledge,

gurmukhi: lhY srb swsqRwn ko m`d cyqM ]
transliteration: Labai Sarab Saastraan Ko Madd Chetan||
translation: He will become knowledgeable of all the Shastras.
Anyone either a Yogi or a Sanyasi or a Vairagi, whosoever reads it.
